resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106157</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106157</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206468</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Within These Walls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerhalb Dieser Wände</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans Ces Murs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dentro DEstas Paredes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">All'interno Di Queste Pareti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέσα σε αυτούς τους τοίχους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dentro De Estas Paredes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tells the stories of five families who lived in one house in Ipswich, Massachusetts, over a 200-year period. The 10-room Georgian-style house was built in the 1760s by a wealthy miller and maritime merchant. Subsequent inhabitants fought in the Revolution, against slavery, and in World War II.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erklärt die Geschichten von fünf Familien, die 
in einem Haus in Ipswich, Massachusetts lebten, über einen Zeitraum 
200-year. Das 10-Raum Georgisch-Art Haus wurde im 1760s von 
einem wohlhabenden Miller und von einem Seekaufmann aufgebaut. 
Folgende Einwohner kämpften in der Umdrehung, gegen Sklaverei 
und im Zweiten Weltkrieg.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dit les histoires de cinq familles qui ont vécu 
dans une maison à Ipswich, le Massachusetts, sur une période 
200-year. La maison de Géorgien-modèle de 10-pièce a été 
construite dans le 1760s par un miller riche et un négociant 
maritime. Les habitants ultérieurs ont combattu en révolution,
contre l'esclavage, et dans la deuxième guerre mondiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diz as histórias de cinco famílias que viveram 
em uma casa em Ipswich, Massachusetts, sobre um período 200-year. 
A casa do Georgian-estilo do 10-quarto foi construída no 1760s 
por um moleiro rico e por um comerciante marítimo. Os 
habitantes subseqüentes lutaram na volta, de encontro ao slavery, e 
na segunda guerra mundial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dice alle storia di cinque famiglie che hanno 
vissuto in una casa a Ipswich, Massachusetts, su un periodo 200-year. 
La casa di Georgiano-stile della 10-stanza è stata costruita 
nel 1760s da un mugnaio ricco e da un commerciante marittimo. 
Gli abitanti successivi hanno combattuto nella rivoluzione, 
contro slavery e nella seconda guerra mondiale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λέει τις ιστορίες πέντε οικογενειών που έζησαν σε 
ένα σπίτι στο Ίπσουιτς, Μασαχουσέτη, κατά τη διάρκεια μιας 
περιόδου 200-έτους. Το σπίτι της Γεωργίας-ύφους 10room 
χτίστηκε στο 1760s από έναν πλούσιο μυλωνά και έναν θαλάσσιο
έμπορο. Οι επόμενοι κάτοικοι πάλεψαν στην επανάσταση, 
ενάντια στη σκλαβιά, και στον παγκόσμιο πόλεμο ΙΙ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuenta las historias de cinco familias que 
vivieron en una casa en Ipswich, Massachusetts, sobre un período 
200-year. La casa del Georgiano-estilo del 10-cuarto fue 
construida en el 1760s por un molinero rico y un comerciante 
marítimo. Los habitantes subsecuentes lucharon en la 
revolución, contra esclavitud, y en la Segunda Guerra Mundial.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206468</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106157</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/within-these-walls</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
